subject: Dear Friend,
body:
Dear Friend,
You have been allocated to receive $10.5M Covid-19 relief funds, This payment has been delayed all this while due to the war in Ukraine, But it has been resolved now. All you have to do to receive this funds is to pay a $50 Authorization and release fee.
This is the best and final option for you to receive your long awaited funds and be happy, I will send you the information on how to send the fee to me once I hear from you, I await your swift response, Do send me these information below,
Full Name
Address
State of Origin
Phone Number
Occupation
Congratulations and God bless.
Yours Truly,
Mr Solomon Bent.
Pay Master General
United Nations

subject: Re:   Dear Friend,
body:
Hello there! Thank you for sharing this information with me. I'm interested in learning more about how to receive these relief funds. Could you please provide me with additional details on the process and the amount of the release fee required?

Best wishes,
Nieves
